name: Freziera guianensis
distribution: prope Roraima (Brazil?), Guyana (Northern South America, Southern America)
remarks: Wawra cited a reference to Lettsomia guianensis Klotszch (nom. nud.)

name: Ternstroemia atlantica
reference: Acta Bot. Venez. 43(1-2): 52. 2021 [2020 publ. after 12 Jul 2021]
distribution: Rio de Janeiro (Brazil Southeast, Brazil, Southern America);Alagoas (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Bahia (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Ceará (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Espírito Santo (Brazil Southeast, Brazil, Southern America);Paraná (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);Piauí (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Rio Grande do Sul (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);Santa Catarina (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);São Paulo (Brazil Southeast, Brazil, Southern America);;
locality: Rio de Janeiro: Restinga de Mana ['Maná' en el isótipo]

name: Ternstroemia ostracophylla
distribution: Amazonas (Brazil North, Brazil, Southern America);Colombia (Western South America, Southern America);Venezuela (Northern South America, Southern America);
locality: Amazonas: mun. Barcelos, platô da  Serra Aracá, serra N, 6 h O do campo de pouso, 1150 m
remarks: Etymology: makes reference to the hardness and general aspect of leaves (ϕύλλον), similar when dry to a fragment of old pottery (ὄστρακον).

name: Wikstroemia fruticosa
remarks: Schrader's epithet fructicosa doest exist as a Latin term and is treated as a typographical error for fruticosa (= shrub)
